title: The phone cannot access the Internet: Method of setting network parameters
answer:
Insert the UIM/SIM card, and APN will automatically configure network parameters. 

 Viewing method: Enter the home menu, select Settings > Wireless and Network > Moreâ€¦ > Mobile Network > Access Point Name (APN). 

 When the parameter is set incorrectly, click the menu button on the APN interface![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110048), and select Reset to restore the default settings.
